local_fun_special.title: Cleveland County Fair
local_fun_special.description: Free entry & parking. Carnival by Wade Shows, wiener dog races, tractor pulls, petting zoo, live music. Hours: Fri 4–11 PM, Sat 11 AM–11 PM, Sun 11 AM–8 PM.

local_fun_special.title: Oklahoma State Fair
local_fun_special.description: Concerts, PRCA Rodeo, Disney On Ice, big midway, exhibits; OG&E Coliseum tickets include fair admission.
